meanings.sent1: I will see you again on the morrow.
meanings.sent2: Tomorrow is the morrow of today.
meanings.sent3: Let's meet at sunrise on the morrow!
meanings.sent4: The morrow brings new opportunities with each dawn.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of the morrow fills me with excitement.

meanings.definition: The time immediately following a particular event.
meanings.sent1: The morrow of the celebration was filled with cleaning up.
meanings.sent2: After the party, the morrow was a day of rest.
meanings.sent3: The morrow of the race left everyone exhausted but happy.
meanings.sent4: In the morrow of the storm, the town came together to rebuild.
meanings.sent5: The morrow of the wedding was a time for reflection and gratitude.
